name: Killer Tune Loudness War
description:
1 Tuner + 1+ Tuners
Other Tuners you control cannot be destroyed by card effects, also your opponent cannot target them with card effects. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Killer Tune" monster from your GY; apply its effect that activates if sent to the GY as Synchro Material. You can only use this effect of "Killer Tune Loudness War" once per turn.
